title: Class Action Claims Margaritaville at Sea Failed to Prevent September 2025 Data Breach
description: A class action claims that Margaritaville at Sea failed to prevent a Sept. 2025 data breach that compromised customers’ personal information.

title: Husqvarna Grass Trimmer Settlement Offers $45 Vouchers, Ending Fire Hazard Recall Lawsuit
description: Husqvarna has agreed to a class action settlement that offers a $45 voucher to those who bought certain grass trimmers that were recalled in Feb. 2024.

title: Class Action Lawsuit Alleges Clorox11030 Air Purifiers Falsely Advertised as Equipped with HEPA Filters
description: A class action lawsuit alleges Clorox falsely markets its 11030 Air Purifier as equipped with a HEPA air filter.

title: Kirkland Signature Tequila Falsely Advertised as Made With 100 Percent Blue Agave, Class Action Claims
description: A class action lawsuit claims that Costco’s Kirkland Signature tequila is not made from 100 percent Blue Weber agave as advertised.
